long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
What is my current location?
My Location Now: Whether you're a traveler, researcher, or just curious to find your current location on maps along with latitude and longitude, use this Chrome Extension to find it easy. This tool show me a map of my location now can be especially useful in a variety of situations, such as letting your loved ones know where you are, reporting whereabouts to your boss, helping someone to easily reach you, learning a new location and its surroundings, finding nearby places of interest, or booking travel tickets and accommodations. 

To share your current location, copy the URL and share it securely to the intended person. This tool never tracks your location in the background or stores your personal information. To know more information such as current elevation, map coordinates to location on maps, map coordinates to address on maps, latitude and longitude conversion, etc. use this mapping website https://whatmylocation.com
